headline: The U.S. Just Took a Giant Step in The Rare Earth Race With China
summary: America’s rare earth weakness isn’t about digging minerals out of the ground; it’s about rebuilding the complex processing and magnet-making capabilities that power everything from fighter jets to electric vehicles.

raw.headline: The U.S. Just Took a Giant Step in The Rare Earth Race With China
raw.summary: America’s rare earth weakness isn’t about digging minerals out of the ground; it’s about rebuilding the complex processing and magnet-making capabilities that power everything from fighter jets to electric vehicles.

headline: NEM vs. AEM: Which Gold Mining Giant Should You Invest in Now?
summary: Newmont and Agnico Eagle strengthen their positions with rising cash flows and project expansions as gold prices stay elevated.

headline: LIFT Appoints Jeff Reinson as Senior Vice President of Development
summary: VANCOUVER, British Columbia, Feb. 25, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Li-FT Power Ltd. (“LIFT” or the “Company”) (TSXV: LIFT) (OTCQX: LIFFF) (Frankfurt: WS0) is pleased to announce the appointment of Jeff Reinson, a seasoned mining executive who brings over 25 years of project and engineering leadership experience to the role of Senior Vice President of Development. Mr. Reinson previously served as Vice President of Operations at Burgundy Diamond Mines, where he oversaw the 24/7 operations of Ekati Dia
